name: Mixtape match
description:
Game developed for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 , theme : Rewind .
(For better experience download and run the windows file , the web version works but sometimes is lagging and the player moves too fast.)

In each level you have to combine groups of 3 or more gems vertically or horizontally.

Watch out for the enemies...will try and catch you

To move the player use the mouse : click on the tiles near the player
or the Arrows (WASD) .

Developer and Graphics : Mauro Rilla - https://misterm.itch.io/

Music : Ramsey Johnson  - https://soundcloud.com/ramsey-johnson
